title: Assumably Monospaced Font Please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112252im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5753351129_38f235539c_z_3953.jpg)

I am looking for the typeface in which "Early Summer" (and I'm guessing other English headlines) are written... Any ideas? I already tried whatthefont to no avail.

Thank you ahead of time !

Font: 

 OCRX Compressed (Bold)
